titles.title: A resolution reaffirming the constitutional and statutory protections accorded sealed domestic mail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 337.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/4/2007--Reported to Senate without amendment. Reaffirms the constitutional and statutory protections accorded sealed domestic mail.
